column4: Could anyone here tell me how to be able to watch videos on youtube in Opera? (I know this isnt a opera support chan, but its installed on Ubuntu, Hardy) :-)
install opera 9.50 beta 2... and flash work!
i installed the one from the opera site. For Hardy... and when installed i was notified that there was an update available and downloaded it too...
I'm using opera 9.5 beta 2 and works well!
first you need to install flash on firefox... flash will work on opera too!
